data.lyric:
[ti:Sofia]
[ar:Clairo]
[al:Sofia]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sofia - Clairo
[00:05.68]Lyrics by：Claire Cottrill/Rostam Batmanglij
[00:11.37]Composed by：Claire Cottrill/Rostam Batmanglij
[00:17.05]I think we could do it if we tried
[00:19.93]If only to say you're mine
[00:25.44]Sofia know that you and I
[00:28.66]Shouldn't feel like a crime
[00:34.04]I think we could do it if we tried
[00:36.99]If only to say you're mine
[00:42.29]Sofia know that you and I
[00:45.59]Shouldn't feel like a crime
[00:50.48]You know
[00:52.15]I'll do anything you ask me to
[00:59.15]But oh my god
[01:02.69]I think I'm in love with you
[01:08.00]Standing here alone now
[01:10.19]Think that we can drive around
[01:12.30]I just want to say
[01:13.88]How I love you with your hair down
[01:16.51]Baby you don't got to fight
[01:18.32]I'll be here till the end of time
[01:20.73]Wishing that you were mine
[01:22.89]Pull you in it's alright
[01:24.95]I think we could do it if we tried
[01:27.81]If only to say you're mine
[01:33.30]Sofia know that you and I
[01:36.66]Shouldn't feel like a crime
[01:59.12]Honey I don't want it to fade
[02:02.96]There's things that I know could get in the way
[02:07.50]I don't want to say goodbye
[02:11.78]I think that we could do it if we tried
[02:16.15]I think we could do it if we tried
[02:18.92]If only to say you're mine
[02:24.24]Sofia know that you and I
[02:27.61]Shouldn't feel like a crime
[02:32.88]I think we could do it if we tried
[02:41.45]I think we could do it if we tried
[02:49.81]Sofia know that you and I
[02:53.37]Shouldn't feel like a crime
[02:58.27]Sofia know that you and I
[03:01.73]Shouldn't feel like a crime
data.trans:
[ti:Sofia]
[ar:Clairo]
[al:Sofia]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.68]//
[00:11.36]//
[00:17.05]我觉得只要我们努力 就能长相厮守
[00:19.93]希望我可以说 你是属于我的
[00:25.44]Sofia 要知道 你和我
[00:28.66]不该觉得这是一种罪
[00:34.04]我觉得只要我们努力 就能长相厮守
[00:36.99]希望我可以说 你是属于我的
[00:42.29]Sofia 要知道 你和我
[00:45.59]不该觉得这是一种罪
[00:50.48]你知道
[00:52.15]你要我做什么 我都愿意
[00:59.15]但是 我的天哪
[01:02.69]我觉得我爱上了你
[01:08.00]一个人站在这里
[01:10.19]觉得我们可以开车去兜风
[01:12.30]我只想说
[01:13.88]我喜欢你披散着头发的模样
[01:16.51]宝贝 你不用独自战斗
[01:18.32]我会在你身边 直到时间尽头
[01:20.73]真希望你是属于我的
[01:22.89]拥你入怀 没事的
[01:24.95]我觉得只要我们努力 就能长相厮守
[01:27.81]希望我可以说 你是属于我的
[01:33.30]Sofia 要知道 你和我
[01:36.66]不该觉得这是一种罪
[01:59.12]亲爱的 我不想让这份感情消失
[02:02.96]我知道我们将会遇到阻碍
[02:07.50]我不想和你说再见
[02:11.78]我觉得只要我们努力 就一定能长相厮守
[02:16.15]我觉得只要我们努力 就能长相厮守
[02:18.92]希望我可以说 你是属于我的
[02:24.24]Sofia 要知道 你和我
[02:27.61]不该觉得这是一种罪
[02:32.88]我觉得只要我们努力 就能长相厮守
[02:41.45]我觉得只要我们努力 就能长相厮守
[02:49.81]Sofia 要知道 你和我
[02:53.37]不该觉得这是一种罪
[02:58.27]Sofia 要知道 你和我
[03:01.73]不该觉得这是一种罪
